hero.title: Our Story
hero.subtitle: Passionate about bringing the world's finest wines to your table

story.title: A Journey Through Wine
story.paragraph1: Founded in 2009, our wine club began with a simple mission: to make exceptional wines accessible to enthusiasts around the world. What started as a small group of wine lovers has grown into a community of thousands of members who share our passion for quality and discovery.
story.paragraph2: Our team of certified sommeliers travels the globe, visiting vineyards and meeting winemakers to curate the perfect selection for our members. We believe that every bottle tells a story, and we're committed to sharing those stories with you.
story.paragraph3: Today, we're proud to offer wines from over 50 regions worldwide, with a focus on small-batch producers and sustainable practices. Our commitment to quality, education, and community continues to drive everything we do.
